00014 // Filtering data to be received by request and
00015 // used to build the where part of a query
00016 // filter_active, filter_valid, find, sort_mode,
00017 // filter_process
00018 
00019 
00020 $where = ''; 
00021 $wheres=Array();
00022 
00023 if(isset($_REQUEST['filter_active'])&&$_REQUEST['filter_active']) $wheres[]="isActive='".$_REQUEST['filter_active']."'";
00024 if(isset($_REQUEST['filter_valid'])&&$_REQUEST['filter_valid']) $wheres[]="isValid='".$_REQUEST['filter_valid']."'";
00025 if(isset($_REQUEST['filter_process'])&&$_REQUEST['filter_process']) $wheres[]="pId=".$_REQUEST['filter_process']."";
00026 $where = implode(' and ',$wheres);
00027 
00028 
00029 if(!isset($_REQUEST["sort_mode"])) {  $sort_mode = 'lastModif_desc'; } else {  $sort_mode = $_REQUEST["sort_mode"];} 
00030 if(!isset($_REQUEST["offset"])) {  $offset = 0;} else {  $offset = $_REQUEST["offset"]; }$smarty->assign_by_ref('offset',$offset);
00031 if(isset($_REQUEST["find"])) { $find = $_REQUEST["find"];  } else {  $find = ''; } $smarty->assign('find',$find);
00032 $smarty->assign('where',$where); $smarty->assign_by_ref('sort_mode',$sort_mode);
00033 
00034 $items = $processMonitor->monitor_list_processes($offset,$maxRecords,$sort_mode,$find,$where);
00035 $smarty->assign('cant',$items['cant']);
00036 
00037 $cant_pages = ceil($items["cant"] / $maxRecords);$smarty->assign_by_ref('cant_pages',$cant_pages);$smarty->assign('actual_page',1+($offset/$maxRecords));
00038 if($items["cant"] > ($offset+$maxRecords)) {  $smarty->assign('next_offset',$offset + $maxRecords);} else {  $smarty->assign('next_offset',-1); }
00039 if($offset>0) {  $smarty->assign('prev_offset',$offset - $maxRecords);  } else {  $smarty->assign('prev_offset',-1); }
00040 $smarty->assign_by_ref('items',$items["data"]);
00041 
00042 $all_procs = $items = $processMonitor->monitor_list_processes(0,-1,'name_desc','','');
00043 $smarty->assign_by_ref('all_procs',$all_procs["data"]);
00044 
00045 
00046 $smarty->assign('mid','tiki-g-monitor_processes.tpl');
00047 $smarty->display("styles/$style_base/tiki.tpl");
